title: DOCX Report Generator
description: Fill templated DOCX with data to produce reports/invoices, with images and PDF export.
author: claudepro
content:
# DOCX Report Generator

Data-driven document generation with templated DOCX, including images and page control.

## Key Operations
- Placeholder-based templating
- Image embedding
- Page breaks and styles
- Optional PDF export

examples.title: Render a template (Python)
examples.code:
from docxtpl import DocxTemplate

doc = DocxTemplate('template.docx')
context = { 'client': 'Acme', 'items': [{'name': 'Widget', 'price': 9.99}] }
doc.render(context)
doc.save('invoice.docx')

steps: Use libreoffice for reliable PDF export

troubleshooting.issue: Fonts or rendering differ across OS
troubleshooting.solution: Embed fonts or use a containerized conversion with consistent fonts.
